page.title: 04FARMING
page.content: Nearly half the area is covered in farmland, mainly grassland with a few fields of arable. The higher grassland is usually permanent grass for grazing. Rotation grass is used for hay and silage. The crops are mainly barley, some turnips and potatoes. Most farms keep cattle, some dairy, some beef. The Royal Ordnance Factory covers about 4.5 sq km in our area which used to be farmland. Nearly 0.5 sq km of farmland has been lost to housing estates and the M8 in the last 15 years. In addition to the farmland,around 1 sq km is covered in woodland and wood plantations, mostly mixed decidious and coniferous trees with some gorse.
